评论详情: I wanted to like this because the color is really pretty. But the material is heavy and awkward. It’s not warm at all but it’s just this weird denim canvas type of heavy material that would have no flow or movement. But it also felt like I would rip easily. The pockets were oddly placed and the drawstring was so weird and unflattering and would probably get hooked on everything. At 5’2” it was a tad long on me. I’m also not sure how this is a one size fits all. I’m slender at 5’2”, 100lbs, 24” waist, 30” hip and this skirt was actually tight enough at the waist that there was some stretch to it when I expected it to probably just fit without having the waist stretch. And the bad part is that the waist doesn’t have that much give to it to accommodate a bigger stomach, at least not without probably snapping the stitching. I liked the color enough that if this skirt has been what it is actually worth- probably like $20- I may have kept it. But at over double that price I could not justify keeping something that is so poorly made and awkward just because I loved the orange color of the copper one. If it ever goes on major sale I’d probably buy it again. I’ve tried several different styles of skirts from this brand and I’ve returned them all because I have about the same feeling on each one. I definitely won’t purchase this brand again unless they drop the price to something that reflects what it is actually worth. Again $20 max would be reasonable.
Boutique Quality!

I'll have to update this review later with photos, but I absolutely love this skirt! The cotton is a little thicker so it's not see through like other skirts. I was nervous because there weren"t any reviews but now I want every color! I also like the ethical aspect.

Its nice quality, but it's too short for 5'9". The only way to make this work so it falls at the ankle is to wear it way low on the hips, which isn't very comfortable. I cannot get over how amazing these skirts are. I purchased the copper color a few weeks ago (actually more of a turmeric than a copper) and it was so awesome that I made the investment in the Grey color. The pockets are large enough to hold my kindle, phone and whatever else I need. The style is very flattering to my postpartum belly and the material is very high quality. I'm already considering getting a third in another color. These skirts are perfect for a casual everyday look, easy to dress up for a night out, and I've even worn one as part of my ren fair costume. You just can't beat how comfy and useful this garment is. The pockets alone justify the cost of the skirt. A side note... the gray is actually feldgrau (greenish warm gray). Its a lovely and versatile color.

Fits perfect

So happy to receive this skirt. Love the mission behind the brand. The material is definitely organic cotton and good quality. Material has enough weight to it so it's not see through. Absolutely love the colour: unique and gorgeous. Pockets are always appreciated and though I haven't tested them yet they are a good depth. Highly recommend this product and will likely get it in more colours.  Silhouette is flattering and easy to walk in.

This skirt is amazing - while it's not hard to find skirts that have "pockets," I've been struggling to find skirts that have actually useful pockets.  You know, actually deep enough to safely hold something bigger than a chapstick, where you can fit your whole hand and wiggle your fingers with freedom.  The pockets on this skirt are big enough to hold a modern large smart phone!  Without the phone sticking out of it at all!  The pockets even have cinch ties for closing the top of the pocket if you want, that don't look detract from the look of the skirt.Not only that, but the skirt is comfortable and a good length.  The elastic waist band does in fact expand large enough to fit like an XL comfortably.  The color is nice too - I got the rust one.  It looks slightly lighter in color in real life than it does in the photos, but some slight variation is expected when shopping from a screen - I've seen much greater color differences than this just looking at the same thing on different computer monitors.  Overall, I'm very happy, and I'm glad it was worth the price.

Very pretty skirt, love the pockets and the color was nice. I’m 5’3 and the length was good. The waist is really high and wasn’t to keen on folding it down. Im short waisted. I’m 135lb and curvy and the waist as far as tightness fit great not to tight , not too loose. I sent this back for the other style that has a smaller waist band .
